document_name: 2011 Annual Progress Report- PSP for DDR in Darfur-Final-DFAIT.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/SDN/00058528/2011 Annual Progress Report- PSP for DDR in Darfur-Final-DFAIT.pdf

donor_name: DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS AND INTERNATIONAL TRADE (DFAIT) GOVERMENT OF CANADA
outputs.output_descr: The Preparatory Support Project for DDR in Darfur aims at providing the Sudan DDR Commission with technical and planning assistance to develop its implementation capacity in Darfur, as well as thematic expertise to draw on in order for the Sudan DDR Commission and Darfurian partners to agree on the design and operational approach to DDR in Darfur.

project_descr: Capacity development support is planned to the Sudan Disarmament, Demobilization and Reintegration Commission (SDDRC) in designing and planning a formal DDR programme.
